modele.occupant.objetFixe

Class Glue

  • java.lang.Object
    • modele.occupant.Occupant
      • modele.occupant.objetFixe.ObjetFixe
        • modele.occupant.objetFixe.Glue
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Questionnable

    public class Glue
extends ObjetFixe
    The "Glue" class is a subclass of "ObjetFixe" that represents a stationary object on a grid with a waiting time for mobile objects that come into contact with it.

    • Method Detail

      • process

        public void process(ObjetMobile h)
        This function updates the position of a mobile object on a grid and sets its waiting time.
        Parameters:
        h - The parameter "h" is an object of type "ObjetMobile", which represents a mobile object that can move on a grid.

      • getTourAttente

        public int getTourAttente()
        This function returns the value of the variable "tourAttente".
        Returns:
        The method is returning an integer value of the variable `tourAttente`.

      • getTourAttente

        public void getTourAttente(int tourAttente)
        This Java function sets the value of a variable called "tourAttente".
        Parameters:
        tourAttente - tourAttente is a parameter of type integer that represents the number of turns a player has to wait before being able to take another action in a game or simulation. The method sets the value of the instance variable "tourAttente" to the value passed as the parameter.
